value:
Askr's tea sure is tasty! Maybe I
could sneak some back to Friege...
Oh, and some of these cookies too!

Sharing delicious tea together is way
better than wasting time fighting each
other. Don't you agree?

Ta-dah! Isn't this outfit the cutest
thing you've ever seen? I wonder
what Father Claud would think...

I can guarantee these sweet treats
are tasty! How? Um, I may have had
had a nibble or two myself...

How about if I heat the teapot up
with a few zaps? Aw, why not?
It's a great idea!

Hi, I'm Tailtiu! I'm working a tea party
at $Nf's place!$k$pStop by if you get the chance!

Woohoo! The tea turned out great.
I'd love to brew some for the folks
back in Friege.

Smiles are kind of contagious. When
I see one, I can't help but smile back!

Oh NO! I think I scalded the tea!
Ugh, this is the worst...

I think I'm starting to get this whole
"tea-brewing" thing. I can tell my next
pot is going to be the best one yet!

Welcome to Tailtiu's Tea Time! You'll
be faithfully served today by yours
truly, in one of my cutest outfits ever!

Oh, hi! What did you think of Tailtiu's
Tea Time, $Nu?$k$pHope you had as much fun as I did!
Don't get me wrong, it always feels
good to get praise for my magic...$k$pBut it's such a thrill to hear people
compliment the tea I've made and
see them smile!$k$pI want to invite even more people to
Tailtiu's Tea Time, and I won't rest
until they're all beaming!$k$pHmm, whom would I invite... Father,
Father Claud, Azelle... Heehee, and
that's just the beginning!$k$pIf I could help everyone become
better friends with my tea, I'd be
the happiest girl in the world!
Voil√†!
Time for tea!
Right away!
Isn't it delicious?
Time for my break!
I spilled everything...
Welcome to Tailtiu's Tea Time! *giggle* How does that sound?
*startle* I wasn't sneaking food, I promise!
I think even Father Claud would enjoy being served by someone this cute, don't you?
The worst thing would be if nobody showed up. *sigh*
These cakes are delicious. Really delicious.
I wish my father and grandmother could enjoy a tea party like this.
There you are. Sit yourself down! It's time for a full tea service.
It's ready!
Uh, who was next?
Here I am!
